page.title: 02ATTITUDES TO AYLESBURY
page.content: We surveyed people's attitudes towards Aylesbury.We asked them their thoughts on the"Blue Leanie"which is a modern insurance building.Half the people we asked said it was an eyesore but the rest said it was quite attractive.We also asked what facility they thought Aylesbury needed most.46% said that it needed a sports centre,31%,a department store.According to our survey Aylesbury is a pleasant place.Quite a few old people disagreed with this because they said the place had deteriorated over the years.Nearly all the people said Aylesbury isn't good for shopping as most of the main shops are scattered around the town so you either have to walk or take the car which could cost money parking.94% said there wasn't enough entertainment for the young.A few felt the facilities available were not properly used.
